/sw/summit/cuda/10.2.89/bin/nvcc   -m64 --expt-relaxed-constexpr --expt-extended-lambda -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -gencode=arch=compute_70,code=sm_70 -maxrregcount=255 -Xcudafe --diag_suppress=esa_on_defaulted_function_ignored --use_fast_math -Xcudafe --display_error_number --forward-unknown-to-host-compiler -O3 -DNDEBUG -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/fextrema.dir/fextrema.cpp.o -o CMakeFiles/fextrema.dir/cmake_device_link.o ../../Src/libamrex.a
